task.title: How do I start a Meeting?
task.shortdesc: You can start a meeting through the Meetings option from the drop-down menu, or click the Launch invite and send button to instantly send a meeting invite in the conversation box.

context.p: To start a meeting with someone to your contact list:

step.cmd: Click in the navigator, and select Meetings.
Click SAMETIME MEETINGS, to open the HCL Sametime Meetings application.
In the Start/Join a meeting input box, enter the meeting name and click START.

info.note: Click Generate meeting name to auto-generate a meeting name.
info.p: For more information on HCL Sametime Meetings, see HCL Sametime Meetings documentation.
